name: Inexplicabilis
description:
Over and over again...
Over and over again...
Over and over again.
Is there no escape?
Their screams shall haunt me endlessly

  • Complete the ritual, set everything right.
  • The world rewinds with your actions, set everything right.
  • An unknow horror haunts you, set everything right.

Over and over again...
Over and over again...

Yo', LFJ Game Studios here, with our second game ever, and our first horror game. If you like the game please consider supporting us, also make sure to give us some feedback, what did you like? What didn't you like? Did you encounter a bug? Videos and screenshots are appreciated as well!
